FuncDef: The reset ptp statistics command clears statistics about 1588v2 messages received and sent by interfaces. The reset ptp statistics command clears statistics about 1588v2 messages received and sent by interfaces. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H-48S6CQ, CE6881H-48S6CQ-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Clears statistics about 1588v2 messages received and sent by all interfaces.
-

Clears statistics about 1588v2 messages received and sent by a specified interface.
-

ExtraInfo: During device debugging or maintenance, to check whether a 1588v2 device can implement time synchronization, run the reset ptp statistics command to clear statistics about 1588v2 messages received and sent by a specified interface or all interfaces and then run the display ptp interface command to check statistics about 1588v2 messages.
